City Mayor & Council
--------------------

![Wendy Moore](https://cityofportaransas.org/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/Wendy-Moore-11-2025-scaled.jpg)

**City Mayor**
**Wendy Moore**
Port Aransas City Hall
710 West Avenue A
Elected: May 2022/May 2024
**[City Hall:
361-749-4111](tel:361-749-4111)**
**[Cell:
361-749-4111](tel:361-749-4111)**
**[mayormoore@cityofportaransas.org](mailto:mayormoore@cityofportaransas.org)**

COG REPS: Mayor, City Manager and all Council members

Mayor, Council Members Place #2,#4, & #6 Expire: Even Years
Council Members Place #1,#3, & #5 Expire: Odd Years

![Chad Shimaitis](https://cityofportaransas.org/wp-content/uploads/2025/11/Shimaitis-Photo-11-2025-scaled.jpg)

Council Members Place #1,#3, & #5 Expire: Odd Years
